alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A shower with strong gusty winds will impact portions of north central Arapahoe, northeastern Denver and western Adams Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing strong, gusty winds, over Denver International Airport, or 19 miles northeast of Denver, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could produce considerable blowing dust, reduced visibility, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Aurora, northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Watkins, Manila Village and Barr Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
